drug.name: Trimazosin
drug.description: Trimazosin is a sympatholytic alpha blocker.

article.citation: van Kalken CK, van der Meulen J, Oe PL, Vriesendorp R, Donker AJ: Pharmacokinetics of trimazosin and its effects on blood pressure, renal function and proteinuria during short-term therapy of patients with impaired renal function and hypertension. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1986;31(1):63-8.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as n-arylpiperazines. These are organic compounds containing a piperazine ring where the nitrogen ring atom carries an aryl group.
